title: PVT-Based Online Science Learning Satisfaction Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science concept comprehension and basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: VR simulation-centered education using smartphones, enabling virtual experiences of real scientific phenomena

learning_goals: Learners achieve ≥80% understanding of science concepts by utilizing sensory requirement elements (reproducibility, scalability) based on PVT theory.
Learners achieve ≥75% completion rates for science problem-solving projects through VR simulations applying relational requirement elements (interaction, collaboration).
Learners record ≥4.0 in online learning satisfaction and ≥4.2 in continued use intention on a 5-point Likert scale evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
